name: Rhythm Factory
description:
The robots went out of sync in this Rhythm Factory. Help them sync their moves with the assembly line to join all the bike parts together.

An (very) short game, created for the GMTK Game Jam.

Controls (have not had the time to put them into the game): 

Click on a robot to select it. Then push the space-key to the rhythm of the music. Exit the view through clicking again.
